org.gridgain.grid.cache.datastructures
Interface GridCacheAtomicLong

All Superinterfaces:
GridMetadataAware, Serializable
public interface GridCacheAtomicLong
extends GridMetadataAware

This interface provides a rich API for working with distributedly cached atomic long value.

Note that atomic long is only available in Enterprise Edition.

Functionality

Distributed atomic long includes the following main functionality:
  • Method GridCacheAtomicLong.get() synchronously gets current value of atomic long.
  • Various get..(..) methods synchronously get current value of atomic long and increase or decrease value of atomic long.
  • Method GridCacheAtomicLong.addAndGet(long l) synchronously sums l with current value of atomic long and returns result.
  • Method GridCacheAtomicLong.incrementAndGet() synchronously increases value of atomic long and returns result.
  • Method GridCacheAtomicLong.decrementAndGet() synchronously decreases value of atomic long and returns result.
  • Method GridCacheAtomicLong.getAndSet(long l) synchronously gets current value of atomic long and sets l as value of atomic long.
All previously described methods have asynchronous analogs.
  • Method GridCacheAtomicLong.name() gets name of atomic long.

Creating Distributed Atomic Long

Instance of distributed atomic long can be created by calling one of the following methods:
  • GridCache.atomicLong(String)
  • GridCache.atomicLong(String, long, boolean)

Wiki & Forum:

Forum

See Also:
GridCache.atomicLong(String), GridCache.atomicLong(String, long, boolean)

compareAndSet

boolean compareAndSet(long l,
                      GridPredicate<Long> p,
                      GridPredicate<Long>... pa)
                      throws GridException
Atomically sets the new value l of atomic long if set of predicates is true asynchronously.

Throws:
GridException - If operation failed.
Parameters:
l - New value of atomic long.
p - Predicate which should evaluate to true for value to be set.
pa - Additional predicates can be used optional.
Returns:
Result of predicates execution. If true value of atomic long will be updated.

compareAndSetAsync

ps - Additional predicates can be used optional.
Returns:
Future that completes once calculation has finished.

removed

boolean removed()
Gets status of atomic.

Returns:
true if atomic was removed from cache, false in other case.
